detectors.description: Proxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.2/e5/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/e5/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol#729-797) is a proxy, but doesn't seem upgradeable.

BeaconProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.2/e5/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/e5/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol#878-922) is an upgradeable proxy.
_implementation was found in a different contract.
_implementation is an address state variable.
UpgradeableBeacon._implementation (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.2/e5/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/e5/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol#1376) gets value from a cross-contract call: IBeacon(_getBeacon()).implementation()
MonegraphERC721Factory appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of MonegraphERC721Factory comes from the value of ERC1967Upgrade._getBeacon(). (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.2/e5/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/e5/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol#604)
Found compatibility checks in all upgrade functions.
To remove upgradeability, delete upgradeTo from UpgradeableBeacon

ERC1967Proxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.2/e5/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/e5/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol/E54d11b0fb7B92064Dcc9c30d209b0Cc37656F44_MonegraphERC721Factory.sol#1238-1256) is a proxy, but doesn't seem upgradeable.
